General.Name: Arabian Internet and Communications Services Co CSJC
General.Description: Arabian Internet and Communication Services Company provides information technology solutions in Saudi Arabia. It offers system integration and connectivity, business outsourcing, managed, IoT digital, and cybersecurity integration services; and cloud services, including colocation, infrastructure, and SAAS and PAAS. The company also provides extension, installation, managing and monitoring of computer networks, wiring and communications; repair and maintenance of engines, systems, and fixed and portable data storage devices; road repair, maintenance, and supplies; installation and maintenance of security devices; and senior management advisory. In addition, it engages in the design of computer systems; and provision of electronics, data centers, and software and e-learning development, as well as data analysis and management. Further, the company provides communication and internet services; general admin and support services; and searching employees for jobs hiring either by direction or tests and temporary employment agencies, as well as engages in the production of electronic contents and software. It serves healthcare, real estate, education, government, oil and gas, banking, and telecom sectors. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Arabian Internet and Communication Services Company is a subsidiary of Saudi Telecom Company.
